mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize images for mobile and reduce heavy JavaScript usage to enhance mobile performance.
loadingSpeedTip: Implement lazy loading for images and minimize HTTP requests to improve loading times.
seoOptimizationTip: Ensure all page titles and meta descriptions are unique and descriptive for better SEO ranking.
userExperienceTip: Improve navigation by adding sticky headers or clearer calls to action to enhance user journey.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking process by reducing the number of steps and offering guest checkout options.
tips: Improve mobile responsiveness and site speed for a better overall user experience.
Add more engaging content and customer testimonials to boost trust and engagement.
